title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing with Stripe
Building a scalable product catalog with search and filtering
Creating a responsive admin dashboard for inventory management
outcomes: Achieved 99.9% uptime with optimized server architecture
Reduced cart abandonment rate by 25% through UX improvements

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
challenges: Implementing real-time synchronization across multiple users
Scaling the application to handle large teams and projects
outcomes: Improved team productivity by 35% for beta users

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard that provides current weather conditions, forecasts, and weather maps using multiple APIs.
challenges: Integrating multiple weather APIs for comprehensive data
outcomes: 99.5% API uptime with robust error handling
Featured in 'Best Weather Apps' article by TechCrunch

title: Personal Blog Engine
description: A custom-built blog engine with markdown support, SEO optimization, and content management system for technical writing.
challenges: Implementing server-side rendering for optimal SEO
Creating a flexible content management system
Optimizing build times for large numbers of blog posts
outcomes: Reduced page load time by 60% compared to previous platform

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and professional journey. Built with modern web technologies.
challenges: Implementing a responsive design that works across all devices

title: API Rate Limiter
description: A flexible and efficient rate limiting middleware for Node.js applications with support for multiple storage backends.
challenges: Supporting multiple storage backends (Redis, MongoDB, Memory)
Ensuring high performance with minimal memory footprint
outcomes: Contributed to by 15+ open source developers
